title: Gold IV Support Main looking for a flex team or just a team in general

embed.description: Istezz / Gold 4 16LP / 8W 7L Win Ratio 53% / Karma - 4W 2L Win Ratio 67%, Nautilus - 4W 1L Win Ratio 80%, Morgana - 2W 3L Win Ratio 40%, Thresh - 2W 3L Win Ratio 40%, Ahri - 3W 1L Win Ratio 75%

body:
I only just recently got back into league and I'm still adapting to the new meta. I'm currently looking for a flex team or just a team in general

I'm 19 (20 this year)
Main Champs: Karma, Thresh, Blitzcrank, Morgana, Miss Fortune and Lulu (I am working on Braum and willing to learn any champions you would need)
Availability: Everyday from 6/7pm - 12 am (Friday being the only day I can't play)
